title: Lesson 97
paragraph: This lesson focuses on space and scale, emphasizing vastness, immensity, and transcendence.

words.meaning: of very great extent or size; immense
words.example: The desert stretched out in a vast expanse.

words.meaning: extremely large or great, especially in scale or degree
words.example: The project required an immense amount of effort.

words.meaning: covering a wide area in terms of space or scope
words.example: The hotel had an expansive view of the ocean.

words.meaning: great in importance, extent, or size
words.example: Building the bridge was a monumental task.
She had boundless energy and enthusiasm.

words.meaning: limitless or endless in space, extent, or quantity
with a wide, unbroken view of an area
words.example: The hotel room offered a panoramic view of the mountains.
The statue was colossal in size.

words.meaning: relating to the universe or cosmos
beyond or above the range of normal or physical human experience
words.example: The musician delivered a transcendent performance.
